instruction: If the emotion of happiness is present in the one of the dialogues of the conversation, then output Yes otherwise output No
input: I only want a little off the top and the sides and back to have clean lines .  Okay . Is your hair naturally curly or is it a perm ?  It's natural . My friend told me you know how to work with curls .  That's my specialty . Let me put this around your neck .  Do you have any product that controls frizz ?  With the cut I'll give you , we will minimize a lot of that .  Thank you !  And when we're done , I'll show you some great stuff to take care of the rest .

instruction: If the emotion of happiness is present in the one of the dialogues of the conversation, then output Yes otherwise output No
input: Good morning , Miss .  Good morning . Could you tell me where I can find the Clothing Department ?  On the left of the elevator of the 3rd floor .  I ’ d like to buy a woolen vest for my grandpa .  I ’ m sure you can find your favorite there .  Thank you very much .  It ’ s my honor .
